comment: /**  * Creates a link with a given url and description.  *  * @param link address that this link should point to  * @param text a description for that link, that should be used in text  * @return link representation  */
code: /**  * Creates a link with a given url and description.  *  * @param link address that this link should point to  * @param text a description for that link, that should be used in text  * @return link representation  */ public static LinkElement link(String link, String text) {     return new LinkElement(link, text). }

comment: /**  * Creates a link with a given url. This url will be used as a description for that link.  *  * @param link address that this link should point to  * @return link representation  */
code: /**  * Creates a link with a given url. This url will be used as a description for that link.  *  * @param link address that this link should point to  * @return link representation  */ public static LinkElement link(String link) {     return new LinkElement(link, link). }
